hints.content:
Here is a picture of what $\angle x$ and $\angle y$ could look like: 

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/0892ef60c904646fc58325a212f1a35ba672b4a7)
Supplementary angles combine to create a straight angle.  So, they have a sum of $180^\circ$.

question.content:
$\angle x$ and $\angle y$ are supplementary angles.  $\angle y$ measures $97^\circ$.  

**What is the measure of $\angle x$?**  


[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\Large{^\circ}$
